## format_error
<Card type="info">
### `function` format_error

Formats an exception into a structured format that can be understood by LLMs.


```python
from mcp_use.errors.error_formatting import format_error
```

**Parameters**
><ParamField body="error" type="Exception" required="True" >   The exception to format. </ParamField>
><ParamField body="context" required="True" >   Parameter value </ParamField>

**Returns**
><ResponseField name="returns" type="dict" >A dictionary containing the formatted error.</ResponseField>

def format_error(error: Exception, context):
